title: Mountain Meditation
description: A guided imagery session to help you visualize serene landscapes.

title: 20 Minute Body Scan Meditation
description: Body scan meditations invite you to move your focus of attention around the body, being curious about your experience and observing any sensations that you become aware of.

title: Sitting Meditation
description: In sitting meditations, the breath frequently serves as the primary point of focus during the practice. Occasionally, they also integrate an awareness of sounds, bodily sensations, thoughts, or emotions.

title: 10 Minute Bell Meditation
description: Sometimes we wish to practice a meditation of our choosing without any guidance. These audio tracks begin and end with the sound of a bell ringing, to orientate you to the practice and to signify the end of the meditation.

title: 5 Minute Brief Meditation
description: This short mindfulness exercises focus on bringing awareness to the process of breathing. As something that we are doing all of the time, watching our breath allows us to come into the present moment and practice being aware.

title: Compassionate Breath Meditation
description: Sitting meditations often use the breath as the central focus of the practice. At times they incorporate awareness of sounds, bodily sensations, thoughts or feelings.

title: 5 Minute Bell Meditation
description: Sometimes we wish to practice a meditation of our choosing without any guidance. These audio tracks begin and end with the sound of a bell ringing, to orientate you to the practice and to signify the end of the meditation.

title: 20 Minute Bell Meditation
description: Sometimes we wish to practice a meditation of our choosing without any guidance. These audio tracks begin and end with the sound of a bell ringing, to orientate you to the practice and to signify the end of the meditation.

title: Breath, Sound, and Body Meditation
description: In sitting meditations, the breath frequently serves as the primary point of focus during the practice. Occasionally, they also integrate an awareness of sounds, bodily sensations, thoughts, or emotions.

title: 4 Minute Body Scan Meditation
description: Body scan meditations invite you to move your focus of attention around the body, being curious about your experience and observing any sensations that you become aware of.
